posts.post_content:
Hi all, I'm looking to sell my T3 Magee, not graded, for $75.  I accept  PayPal,   check  or MO  for    these.  Prices are net to  me, so please add 3%   for   regular  PayPal.   Domestic shipping is $3.50.   Shipping to other   countries, I will work  with  you on  price.  
 
 Additional scans available on  request.  Thanks, and feel free to e-mail any questions: [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL].
 First commitment to buy will go before ongoing negotiations.
